MarrsProject.title: Public Sparql Endpoints

Query.title: Search for a protein by preferred name
Search for a protein by Uniprot ID
Search for a human gene by HGNC Symbol

MarrsProject.Query: PREFIX rdfs:<http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX up:<http://purl.uniprot.org/core/> PREFIX skos:<http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> SELECT distinct ?src ?label ?hgnc ("gene" AS ?type) ("Homo sapiens" AS ?species) ("Uniprot" AS ?provenance) WHERE { SERVICE <http://sparql.uniprot.org/sparql> { ?protein rdfs:seeAlso ?hgnc . ?protein rdfs:seeAlso ?src . ?src up:database <http://purl.uniprot.org/database/GeneID> . ?hgnc rdfs:comment ?label . FILTER (?label IN ("${GENENAME}")) . ?hgnc up:database <http://purl.uniprot.org/database/HGNC> . } }

Query.title: Search for a gene by entrez gene id
Search Uniprot for a disease by keyword
Search for a GO identifier
Search for a GO term
Search for a pathway by name

MarrsProject.Query: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> PREFIX biopax3: <http://www.biopax.org/release/biopax-level3.owl#> SELECT DISTINCT ?src ?label ("pathway" as ?type) ?species ("reactome" as ?provenance) WHERE { SERVICE <https://www.ebi.ac.uk/rdf/services/reactome/sparql> { ?src rdf:type biopax3:Pathway . ?src biopax3:displayName ?label . FILTER (regex(?label, ("${PWYNAME|literal}"), "i")) . ?src biopax3:organism ?taxonId . ?taxonId biopax3:name ?species . FILTER (?species IN ("Homo sapiens"^^xsd:string, "Mus musculus"^^xsd:string)) . } }

Query.title: find genes for a protein
find proteins for a gene
Find reactome pathways containing this reaction
Find reactions contained in this reactome pathway

MarrsProject.Query: PREFIX up:<http://purl.uniprot.org/core/> PREFIX skos:<http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> PREFIX biopax3: <http://www.biopax.org/release/biopax-level3.owl#> SELECT DISTINCT ?src ?dest ?dest_label ("reaction" AS ?dest_type) ?dest_species ("reaction-to-pathway" AS ?interaction) ("reactome" AS ?provenance) WHERE { SERVICE <https://www.ebi.ac.uk/rdf/services/reactome/sparql> { ?src a biopax3:Pathway . ?src biopax3:pathwayComponent ?dest . ?dest a biopax3:BiochemicalReaction . ?dest biopax3:displayName ?dest_label . FILTER (?src IN (${ID|uri-list})) . } }

Query.title: Find super-pathways

MarrsProject.Query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> PREFIX biopax3: <http://www.biopax.org/release/biopax-level3.owl#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?src ?src_label ?dest ?dest_label ?dest_species ("pathway" AS ?dest_type) ("reactome" as ?provenance) ("subpathway" as ?interaction) WHERE { SERVICE <https://www.ebi.ac.uk/rdf/services/reactome/sparql> { ?src rdf:type biopax3:Pathway . ?dest rdf:type biopax3:Pathway . ?dest biopax3:pathwayComponent ?src . ?src biopax3:displayName ?src_label . ?dest biopax3:displayName ?dest_label . FILTER (?src IN (${ID|uri-list})) . ?dest biopax3:organism ?taxonId . ?taxonId biopax3:name ?dest_species . } }

Query.title: Find sub-pathways

MarrsProject.Query: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> PREFIX biopax3: <http://www.biopax.org/release/biopax-level3.owl#> SELECT DISTINCT ?src ?src_label ?dest ?dest_label ?dest_species ("pathway" AS ?dest_type) ("reactome" as ?provenance) ("subpathway" as ?interaction) WHERE { SERVICE <https://www.ebi.ac.uk/rdf/services/reactome/sparql> { ?src rdf:type biopax3:Pathway . ?dest rdf:type biopax3:Pathway . ?src biopax3:pathwayComponent ?dest . ?src biopax3:displayName ?src_label . ?dest biopax3:displayName ?dest_label . FILTER (?src IN (${ID|uri-list})) . ?dest biopax3:organism ?taxonId . ?taxonId biopax3:name ?dest_species . } }

Query.title: Find biochemical reactions of this protein

MarrsProject.Query: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> PREFIX biopax3: <http://www.biopax.org/release/biopax-level3.owl#> SELECT DISTINCT ?src ?dest ?dest_label (?rel AS ?interaction) ("reaction" AS ?dest_type) ("uniprot" AS ?provenance) WHERE { SERVICE <https://www.ebi.ac.uk/rdf/services/reactome/sparql> { ?dest a biopax3:BiochemicalReaction . { { ?dest ?rel ?protein . } UNION { ?dest ?rel ?complex . ?complex a biopax3:Complex . ?complex biopax3:component ?protein . } UNION { ?control biopax3:controller ?protein . ?control biopax3:controlled ?dest . ?control a ?rel . } UNION { ?complex biopax3:component ?protein . ?control biopax3:controller ?complex . ?control biopax3:controlled ?dest . ?control a ?rel . } } ?protein a biopax3:Protein . ?protein biopax3:entityReference ?src . FILTER (?src IN (${ID|uri-list})) . ?dest biopax3:displayName ?dest_label . } }

Query.title: Find proteins and metabolites within a biochemical reaction
Find chembl compounds linked to this protein
find GO terms for protein
add GO terms as attribute
find proteins for GO term
find parent GO terms
find child GO terms
All disease annotations
All protein associations for a disease
find tissues in from which the protein is isolated
find experimental data from selected Array Atlas experiments for this protein

MarrsProject.Query: PREFIX rdfs:<http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX atlas: <http://rdf.ebi.ac.uk/resource/atlas/> PREFIX atlasterms: <http://rdf.ebi.ac.uk/terms/atlas/> SELECT ?src ?column ?value WHERE { SERVICE <http://www.ebi.ac.uk/rdf/services/atlas/sparql> { FILTER (?experiment = <http://rdf.ebi.ac.uk/resource/atlas/E-GEOD-3526>) ?experiment atlasterms:hasAnalysis ?analysis . ?analysis atlasterms:hasExpressionValue ?expression . ?expression atlasterms:isMeasurementOf ?probe . ?expression <http://semanticscience.org/resource/SIO_000300> ?value . ?expression atlasterms:hasFactorValue ?factor . ?factor atlasterms:propertyValue ?column . ?probe atlasterms:dbXref ?src . FILTER (?src IN (${ID|uri-list})) } }

Query.title: search experimental factor ontology by EFO identifier

MarrsProject.Query: PREFIX rdfs:<http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX atlas: <http://rdf.ebi.ac.uk/resource/atlas/> PREFIX atlasterms: <http://rdf.ebi.ac.uk/terms/atlas/> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> SELECT ?src ("ExperimentalFactor" as ?type) ?label WHERE { SERVICE <http://www.ebi.ac.uk/rdf/services/atlas/sparql> { ?src a owl:Class . ?src rdfs:label ?label . ?src <http://www.ebi.ac.uk/efo/definition> ?definition . FILTER (?src = <http://www.ebi.ac.uk/efo/${EFOID}>) . } }

Query.title: get parent factors

MarrsProject.Query: PREFIX rdfs:<http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX atlas: <http://rdf.ebi.ac.uk/resource/atlas/> PREFIX atlasterms: <http://rdf.ebi.ac.uk/terms/atlas/> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> SELECT ?src ("ExperimentalFactor" as ?dest_type) ?dest ?dest_label ?dest_definition WHERE { SERVICE <http://www.ebi.ac.uk/rdf/services/atlas/sparql> { ?src a owl:Class . ?dest a owl:Class . ?src rdfs:subClassOf ?dest . ?dest rdfs:label ?dest_label . ?dest <http://www.ebi.ac.uk/efo/definition> ?dest_definition . FILTER (?src IN (${ID|uri-list})) . } }

Query.title: get child factors

MarrsProject.Query: PREFIX rdfs:<http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX atlas: <http://rdf.ebi.ac.uk/resource/atlas/> PREFIX atlasterms: <http://rdf.ebi.ac.uk/terms/atlas/> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> SELECT ?src ("ExperimentalFactor" as ?dest_type) ?dest ?dest_label ?dest_definition WHERE { SERVICE <http://www.ebi.ac.uk/rdf/services/atlas/sparql> { ?src a owl:Class . ?dest a owl:Class . ?dest rdfs:subClassOf ?src . ?dest rdfs:label ?dest_label . ?dest <http://www.ebi.ac.uk/efo/definition> ?dest_definition . FILTER (?src IN (${ID|uri-list})) . } }

Query.title: Search for drug on wikidata

MarrsProject.Query:
PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/> PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/> PREFIX p: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/> PREFIX v: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/statement/> PREFIX rdfs:<http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT ?src ?label ?chembl ("Drug" as ?type) WHERE { SERVICE <https://query.wikidata.org/bigdata/namespace/wdq/sparql> { ?src wdt:P592 ?chembl . ?src rdfs:label ?label . FILTER (?label = "${DRUGNAME|literal}"@en) } }

Query.title: Find drug-drug interactions from wikidata (wikipedia)
Get pathways for this gene from wikipathways
